title: Sakanwa
author: Sakanwa
content: We all no that is hasn't been fair to us all, what do you think will happen if we fail to vote the right person unknowingly to us all. What do you think will happen to the citizens again?I guess is not just by having PVC   is by knowing who you are voting in will he be good to the society!!.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: Sakanwa on February 22, 2023, 09:48:11 PMI guess is not just by having PVC   is by knowing who you are voting in will he be good to the society!!.What if after knowing the right person to vote for, and you don't have pvc, what do you then do???Bro, fight for space where to lay before you go fighting for mat, if you go fighting for mat first, and eventually get the mat, and coming back, you discover there is no space on the ground to spray the mat and lay down, will you spray the mat in the air?, of course not, so get a ground space first, before you go fighting for mat.Your pvc is the foundation of it all, because if you don't have it, you will even be looking at the right leader but can not get him or her to lead.And for other part of your question, the current coming election is very critical for not just safety, but also the future and progress of nigeria, we can not afford to have the wrong person win the coming election again, we must get it right this time, cus If we don't, the entire citizens of nigeria will enter another bondage, and it will take 40 years before we get another chance to correct our wrongs again - mark my words.The right person must win this election.

comments.author: I_Anime
comments.body: Too much shege seen successfully by everyone so this time the right person will surely win.God Help Nigeria

comments.author: Alphakilo
comments.body: The truth remains that Nigerian politician will remain Nigerian politicians in the sense that they all have similer characteristics. Having your pvc and voting on the election day does not gaurantee a stop to the Nigerians present predicament. Again, Nigerians are not certain of the new incoming President, if he will be the right leader for Nigerians. That is why we should vote wisely irrespective of the religion and tribe because if we fail to vote wisely we all will see another shege even worst than we have seen.Im my conclusion, i think and urge all Nigerians to vote their choice candidate peacefully and say a big NO to election malpractice for the betterment of our country

comments.author: Silver005
comments.body: Well Nigeria have come to a point that we don't really trust anyone anymore,but what else can we do.we will keep on trust in God and always follow our heart's directive and also like the bible says that by their foot we shall know them and someone who really wants to lead his people has nothing to do with bribing people because his good record will always speak for him and that's the kind of people we need, not those who are using money to cover their evil agenda green snake in green grass,no we don't want them our eyes have open..

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: Sincerely to me no politician is the right person, they are all there for their selfish and personal interest, I only pray God should give us somebody that will tackle the basic needs of the citizens which is, securities,employment for the youths, tackle fuel subsidy, utilities etc.I don't even want to talk about PVC and our votes, because with the happenings in the country now, democracy have been so abused, our votes doesn't count, anyone that votes now is like doing a normal exercise now, because inec know who they want to give the power too, our votes are useless, you can use the recent passed election for example..
